title: Wanted Optometrist Assistant Lecturer
description:
Applications are invited for the posts of Assistant Lecturer in the following disciplines from candidates possessing a First Class Master's Degree in the relevant subject Knowledge Fresher's also apply

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: ₹15,000.00 - ₹30,000.00 per month

Work Location: In person

Base pay range
The minimum salary is ₹15K and the max salary is ₹30K.
₹15K – ₹30K/mo (Employer provided)

/mo Median
